overview: What turns men on and what do they like to do when they're behind closed doors? Find out when seven hunky studs give an 'Intimate' look into their private sex lives. Pull back the curtain to hear what turns them on the most - from soft to hard, tender to rough - and then watch as they live out their own passionate fantasies.
tagline: When they decide to get 'Intimate' with you, there's no stopping the passion and sensuality they share.
title: Intimate
